PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.TITLE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP, PSX_RELATIONSHIPCONFIGNAME PSX_RELATIONSHIPCONFIGNAME WHERE PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.DEPENDENT_ID=CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID AND PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.DEPENDENT_ID IN (:"PSXSingleParam/contentids") AND PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.CONFIG_ID = PSX_RELATIONSHIPCONFIGNAME.CONFIG_ID AND PSX_RELATIONSHIPCONFIGNAME.CONFIG_NAME = ':"PSXSingleParam/sys_relationshiptype"' ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID ASC
SELECT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.LOCALE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID IN (:"PSXSingleParam/contentids") ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID
